description: The dashboard provides insights of operation failures through Application Insights.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where "All" in ($operation_name) or operation_Name in ($operation_name)
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
| summarize FailedCount=sumif(itemCount, success == false) by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp asc

panels.description: Click on a result code to filter this dashboard.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where success == false
| where "All" in ($operation_name) or operation_Name in ($operation_name)
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount) by ["Result Code"]=resultCode
| top 5 by Count desc

panels.title: Top 5 response codes

panels.description: Click on an type to open the exceptions dashboard.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
exceptions
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount) by type
| top 5 by Count desc

panels.title: Top 5 exception types

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where "All" in ($operation_name) or operation_Name in ($operation_name)
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where success == false
| summarize ResultCode = sum(itemCount) by resultCode, bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| sort by timestamp asc

dependencies
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where success == false
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount) by type
| top 5 by Count desc

requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where "All" in ($operation_name) or operation_Name in ($operation_name)
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
// calculate average request duration for all requests
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp asc

links.title: Reset to All Operations and All Result codes
Reset to All Operation Names and All Result codes

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| summarize failedCount=sumif(itemCount, success == false)

panels.title: All Failed Operations (Count) matching Result code $result_code

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where "All" in ($operation_name) or operation_Name in ($operation_name)
| summarize failedCount=sumif(itemCount, success == false)

panels.description: Click on the Operation name to filter dashboard.

value.title: Filter dashboard to this failing operation

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let dataset =
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser";
dataset
| summarize
    ["Failed count"]=sumif(itemCount, success == 'False' and ("All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code))),
    ["Impacted users"]=dcountif(user_Id, success == 'False' and ("All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code))),
    ["Total count"]=sum(itemCount)
| project ["Operation name"]="All", ["Failed count"], ["Impacted users"], ["Total count"]
| union (dataset| summarize
    ["Failed count"]=sumif(itemCount, success == 'False' and ("All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code))),
    ["Impacted users"]=dcountif(user_Id, success == 'False' and ("All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code))),
    ["Total count"]=sum(itemCount)
    by ["Operation name"]=operation_Name
| where ["Failed count"] > 0
| top 10 by ["Failed count"] desc)

panels.title: Top 10 Failed Operation Name List

panels.description: Click on the OperationID or Name to view trace details in explorer.
panels.title: Top 20 Sample Failed Operations matching $operation_name by relevance

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where success == false
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount) by resultCode
| sort by Count desc

requests
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| where "All" in ($result_code) or resultCode in ($result_code)
| summarize count=sumif(itemCount, success == false) by operation_Name

title: ${title}
